columns.compatible_since_year: The year when the browser started to support the accelerator.
columns.browser_id: The unique identifier for the browser in the database.
columns.accelerator_id: The unique identifier for the accelerator in the database.

accelerator_compatible_browser.table_description: The table maps browser compatibility with different accelerators.

columns.id: The unique identifier for each browser in the database.
columns.name: The name of the browser used in the market.
columns.market_share: The percentage of market share held by the browser.

browser.table_description: The table lists different web browsers and their market share.

columns.id: The unique identifier for each web client accelerator.
columns.name: The name of the web client accelerator software.
columns.Operating_system: The operating systems compatible with the web client accelerator.
columns.Client: The type of client using the web client accelerator.
columns.Connection: The types of connections supported by the web client accelerator.

Web_client_accelerator.table_description: The table details various web client accelerators and their specifications.
